Articles.Content:
Ok I am at a loss as to what is going on but when ever I take a manned craft out into orbit when I get to the dark side of the planet the batteries stay full, no cheats active either and solar panels are showing as being blocked by the respective body I am in orbit around. The only two mods that are not up to date are ambient light mod and firespitter, bot I doubt have any contection to the issue.

My mod list:

Toolbar

Ambient light mod

EVE

Chatter

Community Resource Pack

DE

Distant Object

Firespitter

KAS

KER

Hot Rockets

Navyfish docking adapter

NEAR

ORSX

Procedural Fairings

Smokescreen

Snacks

Texture Replacer

Kerbal Alarm Clock

MKS/OKS

MM 2.5.1

Edited October 13, 2014 by Liowen
Crew-capable capsules don't have electrical draw, so you'll only drain power when using the reaction wheels or the MPL functions.
GOH, forgot I am not running TAC this time around , I got to use to there being a draw when it was dark. Thanks!
